task.title: Viewing connection data
task.shortdesc: System administrators and Message administrators can monitor live, aggregated connection data and query best and worst peforming connections across several connection metrics.

step.cmd: Go to the Connection Monitor page by clicking MonitoringConnection Monitor .
The Connection Chart shows the current number of active connections to the server and the rate of new connections.
The Connection Data section shows best and worst performing connections for a particular endpoint and metric.

info.note: Only the top 100 connections are displayed.
